trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.
trans-unit.target: 指定将信息发送到打印机的打印控制器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> uses this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>使用此类。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关打印的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间概述。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: 完成控制序列，该序列确定何时以及如何打印文档的某页。

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: 之后，立即调用 OnEndPage<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: 如果在引发异常<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>，不调用 OnEndPage。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>发送到打印机的对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>调用时，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>单页的图形对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage 方法清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>方法释放该对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OnEndPage is called from a printing context of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> is required.
trans-unit.target: 当从打印上下文中调用 OnEndPage<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog><xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>的<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>是必需的。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: Printing to the default printer requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 打印到默认打印机需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>的<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>

trans-unit.source: All other calls this method requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>
trans-unit.target: 所有其他调用此方法要求<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>的<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>表示正在打印的文档。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref>包含有关如何打印文档中的页的数据。

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
trans-unit.target: 本机的 Win32 应用程序编程接口 (API) 无法完成写入页。

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: 完成控制序列，该序列确定何时以及如何打印文档。

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: 之后，立即调用 OnEndPrint<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>事件。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the printing process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: 即使在打印过程中引发了未捕获的异常，称为 OnEndPrint。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>发送到打印机的对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>调用时，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>单页的图形对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>方法清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而 OnEndPrint 方法释放该对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>表示正在打印的文档。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref>包含有关如何打印文档的数据。

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job.
trans-unit.target: 本机的 Win32 应用程序编程接口 (API) 无法完成打印作业。

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
trans-unit.target: -或者-本机 Win32 API 无法删除指定的设备上下文 (DC)。

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: 开始控制序列，该序列确定何时以及如何打印文档中的页。

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: 立即之前调用 OnStartPage<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>在打印中使用的对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>调用时，OnStartPage 方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>单页的图形对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>方法清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>方法释放该对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>表示正在打印的文档。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref>包含有关如何打印文档中的页的数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 最初， <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName>此参数的属性将<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the OnStartPage method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 从的 OnStartPage 方法返回的值将用于设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>对象表示从页<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data.
trans-unit.target: 本机的 Win32 应用程序编程接口 (API) 无法做好准备要接受数据的打印机驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: -或者-本机 Win32 API 无法更新的指定的打印机或绘图仪设备上下文 (DC) 使用指定的信息。

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: 开始控制序列，该序列确定何时以及如何打印文档。

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: 之后，立即调用 OnStartPrint<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>事件。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>在打印中使用的对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 调用 OnStartPrint 之后，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>单页的图形对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>方法清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>方法释放该对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 验证打印机设置有效。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>表示正在打印的文档。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref>包含有关如何打印文档的数据。

trans-unit.source: The printer settings are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 打印机设置不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
trans-unit.target: 本机的 Win32 应用程序编程接口 (API) 无法启动打印作业。
